definition: variant of 斑駁|斑驳[ban1 bo2]
variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.english: My heart is like the mottled walls large shedding bared ferocious obscure.
sentences.chinese: 我的心如班駁的城牆大片脫落露出猙獰的隱晦。

sentences.english: Glistening tears are your shinning light.
sentences.chinese: 班駁閃爍的淚光是你的光芒。

sentences.english: When you mottled familiar escape route.
